summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5736 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Exposition Heights, being the alleys in the block bounded by 34th Avenue Northeast, 35th Avenue Northeast, East 50th Street, University View Place, and East 47th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75757, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
